alert.note: Alert for Stafford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 24 at 12:34AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of south central Kansas and southwest Kansas, including the following counties, in south central Kansas, Barber, Comanche, Kiowa, Pratt and Stafford. In southwest Kansas, Clark. * WHEN...Through this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - After a prolonged dry spell, heavy rainfall is possible across the outlook area. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
